alert.note: Alert for Logan; Simpson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 12:43AM EDT until April 01 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Logan County in south central Kentucky... Simpson County in south central Kentucky... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1143 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Russellville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Logan and Simpson Counties, including the following locations... Neosheo, Dennis, Dot, Auburn, Geddes, South Union, Lickskillet, Schley, Adairville and Cave Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for south central Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for south central Kentucky.
